website_summaries.verdict: A popular Clinique concealer that's designed for minimizing the look of enlarged pores, but is also effective at covering other flaws.
pros: Creates a matte finish that makes pores look less noticeable for up to 12 hours, even in hot, humid conditions
Feels soft and smooth on the skin
Only takes a few drops for excellent coverage
Fans also praise how well it covers blemishes, freckles, and small lines
cons: Somewhat difficult to blend to get the best results
A few repeat customers are concerned that the formula has been changed, as they found it less effective than previous tubes

customer_reviews.title: Pore concealer
customer_reviews.text: This product is helpful if you want to conceal large pores.
customer_reviews.author: Paula J. Frazier

customer_reviews.title: The BEST cover-up!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product!!! I use it everyday and it covers beautifully. I recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with the produc
customer_reviews.text: Disliked the product I received. A white dry residue was left behind on my skin. I threw it away
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's works
customer_reviews.text: It won't reduce your pores over time but it does work well at filling in and hiding them. I plan to reorder and keep using.
customer_reviews.author: mini

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love
customer_reviews.text: I have large pores and this really helps with minimizing the look of them. I use it after I apply a light concealer. Works great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wendie E. Murray

customer_reviews.title: I used this product and was satisfied with it
customer_reviews.text: I used this product and was satisfied with it. It's not plastic/laser surgery or overnight magic but I can see a visual improvement on my skin when I use as directed I will definitely use this product again!
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Not only does it minimize my pores, but love the way it feels on my face!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Tremper

customer_reviews.title: CLINIQUE TO THE RESCUE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was using 5 SEC BLUR GARNIER but I really like this better because it's good for my skin!
customer_reviews.author: JWRIGHT

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Works great under my make up tha I use on a daily basis! Thank you for inventing this!!!! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: It made a little difference but it is supposed to be worn over your makeup. This makes no sense to me as it just makes a mess of my makeup. I tried it under my makeup but it was just ended up mixing in and any benefit was undone.
customer_reviews.author: sw

customer_reviews.title: Must-have refiner in summer
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to refiner for my shiny T-zone during the humid summer months. It glides onto my skin quickly and absorbs excess oil and lasts for several hours. I keep this tube inside my purse at all times in summer. I noticed that you need to use it up within a couple of months after opening, otherwise the gel/cream dries up in the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: kitty pinkerton

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied w purchase
customer_reviews.text: I normally get the light? But the bright was the only available option. It works well! I use it on my nose.
customer_reviews.author: PET

customer_reviews.title: It's effective.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 79 years old and I've been using this product for years. Clinique has improved it over the years and it's creamier now. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Haak

customer_reviews.title: Looking good!
customer_reviews.text: Don't know what it's doing to my pores but it makes my make up look like perfection. Really flawless. Can't ask for more than that.
customer_reviews.author: Rixmom

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, BUT... (update)
customer_reviews.text: I just sent in a review but forgot to mention that Clinique also has three different shades to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: J. MCILHENNY

customer_reviews.title: Clinique Pore Refining Solutions instant perfector - really good product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this over my liquid makeup but before powder blush for many, many years on my nose, cheeks, & chin for my large pores...love it!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie L. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: its a nice product and minimized my pores as its supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Udaya

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe it took this ling for me to find this. It works perfectly, just need a small amount, love it. Also makes it easy to wear less foundation. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: NONO

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money for me. I tried applying this several different ways and it always looks terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Instantly blurs the appearance of pores. Feels silky smooth too. Has a whitish cast when you first put it on but becomes invisible. Will definitely repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: noel

customer_reviews.title: Kind of amazing...quickly minimizes pores
customer_reviews.text: This really does minimize pores; it is kind of magical. Put it on UNDER your makeup, though. Although the directions say you can put it on over makeup, if you do the makeup will settle in your pores and actually look bigger. If you put it on under your makeup, it works wonders!
customer_reviews.author: Christine McHolley

customer_reviews.title: Caused my skin to break out
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to return this product. I used it one time and I have sensitive skin with rosecea. This caused my entire cheek area to break out.
customer_reviews.author: Debby

customer_reviews.title: Did not reduce appearance of pores!
customer_reviews.text: This product did nothing to make pores look smaller. It puts a thin film on your face which only made my skin feel a bit smoother. Nothing special, a good cleansing also gives a smooth texture. Also, it did not do well under foundation.
customer_reviews.author: IDunno Askem

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I discovered clinique pore minimizer for myself 4 years ago, and have been using it religiously ever since. I tried almost all other pore minimizing stuff available on the market, including more expensive cosmetics like Estee Lauder and Dr. Brandt brands, but no other treatment is like clinique. My only fear is that they stop making it one day. Maybe I should buy like 100 of them..
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Beware.........price compare
customer_reviews.text: Great product, silky smooth application, filled in pores and helps makeup stay. Almost hit buy now button....then had to go....ended up in mall and fate took control. I decided to check it out retail and bought it in Macy's for $18.00.....online rip off
customer_reviews.author: diana10

customer_reviews.title: SPACKLE
customer_reviews.text: I think that if you really have large pores, like I do, this just looks like spackle. If your pores aren't that bad, this might make them better. I have truly enlarged pores. They look better with nothing in them than this. I don't wan't my pores to feel and look like a landfill. I don't want pore spackle that shows, thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Cat Lady

customer_reviews.title: Helps, but isn't a miracle
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased at Macys for $20 (thanks to the review regarding overpriced here!). I have visible pores in area out from nose, and after using several layers, the pores are still visible even after makeup. This is a letdown after reading rave reviews. it does leave a nice feel, but I bought for my appearance.
customer_reviews.author: NZ

customer_reviews.title: One of Clinique's Best Products
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have in my makeup case. My skin is oily, and it is a great shine controller. It is a terrific base under foundation, also.
customer_reviews.author: satgal

customer_reviews.title: An absolute Must!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Clinique's Pore Refining Solutions for about 2 years. I am fair complected with alot of freckles. I have pretty clear skin for being 41 yrs old, however, I tend to have oily skin. I use this primarly for the few pores which seem to me to be on the larger side. It's wonderful! I am not into alot of makeup, but I love, love , love this! I wear this over my moisturizer, a bit of blush and mascara, and lip gloss. I have the natural look. I will only wear this product; good thing is too, it doesn't clog pores, so the times I don't feel like washing my face, it doesn't clog like foundations.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: answer to having a pore-free face
customer_reviews.text: I love this. Dab a little on under makeup and VOILA....no pores. I won't use anything else. Hides enlarged pores perfectly
customer_reviews.author: val

product_meta.title: Clinique Pore Refining Solutions Invisible Bright Instant Perfector for Women, 0.5 Ounce
product_meta.description: Look smooth and virtually flawless with pores that appear more than 50% smaller-instantly. Natural-looking matte finish lasts up to 8 hours. Resists sweat, humidity. In two skin tone shades or Invisible Bright for subtle brightening.
